errors.title: Low cell current in forward direction
errors.fix: Check DC cord, clean cell if necessary, or replace cell.

errors.title: Low cell current in reverse direction
errors.fix: Same as 120 — check DC cord, clean cell if necessary, or replace cell.

errors.title: Low to no current at cell
errors.fix: Check DC cord, clean cell, or replace if necessary.

errors.title: Low forward current with low VAC input
errors.meaning: Current low and VAC input below 100/200 VAC.
errors.fix: Check input voltage, transformer, and PIB voltages.

errors.title: Low reverse current with low VAC input
errors.meaning: Current low and VAC input below 100/200 VAC.
errors.fix: Check input voltage, transformer, and PIB voltages.

errors.title: High salinity
errors.fix: Dilute pool water to reduce salt.

errors.title: PIB service condition (low AC voltage)
errors.meaning: Usually caused by low incoming AC voltage or faulty sensor.
errors.fix: Check transformer voltages; replace sensor if needed.

errors.title: Flow sensor service
errors.fix: Clean sensor, check for damage, replace if necessary.

errors.title: Low VAC input / power supply not regulated
errors.meaning: Unit wired incorrectly or low input voltage.
errors.fix: Verify correct supply wiring and voltage.

errors.title: Pool temperature too high
errors.fix: Cool water or shut system down until temperature lowers.

errors.title: Flow sensor air lock / very low salinity
errors.fix: Bleed air, correct salinity, or replace flow sensor.

errors.title: Heated sensor element not heating
errors.fix: Generates 172 (Flow sensor service). Replace sensor if needed.

errors.title: Salinity sensor <0.2 gpl
errors.meaning: No salt or sensor air locked.
errors.fix: Correct salinity or bleed air. Generates 175 (flow sensor air lock).

errors.title: PIB power supply too low or too high
errors.fix: Generates 173 or 170 depending on Level II code.

errors.title: VAC input too low
errors.fix: Generates 173 (low input voltage) if Level II 187 present.

errors.title: High cell current with low voltage
High cell current with low voltage
Cell current 85% lower than desired
errors.meaning: Cell voltage above 19V with very low current.

errors.title: Salinity invalid (PIB error)
errors.meaning: Out of range due to PIB error.
